DOC.brief_title: A Phase I , Randomized , Single-blind , Controlled , Single Center Study Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity Dose Range Monovalent Glycoconjugate Antigen Vaccine Group B Streptococcus Healthy Women 18-40 Years Age
DOC.criteria: healthy female 18 40 year age ; provide write informed consent nature study explain ; available visit schedule study ( i.e . plan leave area end study period ) ; good health determine : medical history , physical assessment , clinical judgment investigator unwilling unable give write informed consent participate study ; pregnant ( serum pregnancy test ) unwilling use acceptable birth control screen least 3 month final immunization nursing ( breastfeed ) mother
